author: Li, CW
adress: Capital Med Univ, Beijing Friendship Hosp, Dept Anesthesiol, Beijing, Peoples R China
title: Comparison of Bispectral Index-Guided Individualized Anesthesia with Standard General Anesthesia on Inadequate Emergence and Postoperative Delirium in Elderly Patients Undergoing Esophagectomy: A Retrospective Study at a Single Center
